entry.title: Onsight Care 4oz Travel Tin for Shampoo + Conditioner Bars
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Travel Tin
Price: 5.00

 4 oz travel tin fits your Onsight Care shampoo & conditioner bar with ease. Perfect if you need a more sturdy travel container to protect/store your bars.

Add a 1 cm thick loofah slice to the bottom of the 4oz tin to create air flow which will allow your bar to dry faster in between uses.

entry.title: Onsight Care Loofah Slice for Shampoo + Conditioner Bars
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Loofah Slice
Price: 3.00

Add a 1 cm thick loofah slice to the bottom of the 4oz tin for Onsight Care shampoo and conditioner bars to create air flow which will allow your bar to dry faster in between uses. Loofah is a gourd like plant grown naturally and can be composted at the end of its life.

entry.title: Smooth Control Shampoo + Conditioner Bar for Oily Hair Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Shampoo + Conditioner Bar
Price: 19.00

No more worry about liquids spilling in your luggage! Save space and pack less with our 4-in-1 Bar. With natural, plant-based ingredients you can feel safe using our Smooth Control Bar for your next traveling or camping adventure.

Made for oily hair types. Say goodbye to greasy, weighed down hair, Smooth Control is made with nourishing nettle leaves, abyssinian and rosemary oils, which are sure to make your hair luscious and soft. Just try to keep your hands out of your hair now!

Onsight Care Smooth Control bar is PH balanced, so it cleanses without stripping your hair or scalp! With the added bonus of a separate conditioner side for extra detangling, no frizz formula that leaves your hair weightless and silky soft.

Lasts approximately 50 washes depending on personal use. Ditch the plastic and save 2-3 plastic bottles per bar! Bars come unpackaged, for traveling we recommend a Travel Tin for safe storage.  

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Sulphate Free
  • No SLS or SCS 
  • Shampoo, Conditioner, Body wash + Shave bar 

To Use

The green side is Shampoo. Simply glide bar directly on your hair to lather and massage into scalp. Leave to sit for 2-5 mins and rinse out thoroughly.

The white side is Conditioner. Again, glide bar directly on your hair and massage well. Concentrate more on mid-shaft to ends. Let sit and rinse out thoroughly.

Keep the bar in a dry area in between uses to prolong its life.

Ingredients

Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (coconut), Cetearyl Alcohol (coconut), Behentrimonium Methosulfate (rapeseed oil), Sapindus Mukorossi (soapberry) fruit, Cetyl Alcohol (vegetable oil), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (coconut), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (almond) oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed oil, Lactobacillus/Arundinaria Gigantea Ferment Filtrate (bamboo), Butylene Glycol (vegetable oil), urtica dioica (nettle), panthenol (vitamin b5), spirulina platensis, Cymbopogon Flexuosus (lemongrass) Oil, Romarinus Officinalis (rosemary) oil.

entry.title: be YOU Conditioner Bar for All Hair Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bottle None
Type: Conditioner Bar
Price: 18.00

the be YOU line is for all hair types. PH Balanced / Salon Grade / Natural.

How to use

Massage throughout the hair and scalp starting at the ends and working your way up. Let set in hair as long as possible. Avoid contact with the eyes.

Storage instructions

After each use make sure the bar dries completely out on a soap dish.  Do not store in the shower as the water and humidity can erode the bars faster.  Store in the open air and not the travel containers as it will make your bar nice and hard, and last longer. 

Ingredients

Cetyl alcohol, behentrimonium methosulfate (and) cetearyl alcohol, cocoa butter, shea butter, coconut oil, olive oil, nettle, horsetail, rhassoul clay, lavender oil, lemongrass oil, citric acid

entry.title: be STRONG Shampoo Bar for Fine & Damaged Hair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bottle None
Type: Shampoo Bar
Price: 18.00

the be STRONG line is for fine or damaged hair.  The avocado oil repairs and strengthens while the red clover promotes new hair growth. PH Balanced / Salon Grade / Natural.

How to use

Lather in your hands or directly on your hair.  Rinse and repeat. If you use a lot of product in your hair, professionals advise on shampooing twice.  Avoid contact with the eyes.

Storage instructions

After each use make sure the bar dries completely out on a soap dish.  Do not store in the shower as the water and humidity can erode the bars faster.  Store in the open air and not the travel containers as it will make your bar nice and hard, and last longer. 

Ingredients

Sodium coco isethionate, decyl glucoside, sodium lactate, cocoa butter, avocado butter,cetyl alcohol avocado oil, olive oil, red clover, calendula, panthenol, red clover extract, rhassoul clay, rosemary oil, lavender oil, cedarwood oil, citric acid

entry.title: be STRONG Conditioner Bar for Fine & Damaged Hair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bottle None
Type: Conditioner Bar
Price: 18.00

The be STRONG is for thin or damaged hair that needs strengthening. Nettle and avocado oil strengthens while red clover stimulates new growth. PH Balanced / Salon Grade / Natural.

Directions 

Get the bar nice and hot in the shower. Massage throughout the hair and scalp. For long hair, grab a small handful and massage from root to tip.  Let set in hair as long as possible.

Storage Instructions

After each use make sure the bar dries completely out on a soap dish.  Do not store in the shower as the water and humidity can erode the bars faster.  Store in the open air and not the travel containers as it will make your bar nice and hard, and last longer. 

Ingredients

Cetyl alcohol, cocoa butter, behentrimonium methosulfate (and) cetearyl alcohol, avocado butter, avocado oil, olive oil, red clover, calendula, vitamin e, rosemary oil, lavender oil, cedarwood oil, citric acid

entry.title: Dandruff & Dry Scalp Conditioner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Conditioner
Price: 18.00

Zinc Pyrithione and Aloe Vera Dandruff & Dry Scalp Conditioner gently cleans and moisturizes your scalp, while removing dandruff flakes and preventing irritation. Enriched with natural extracts such as Chamomile Extract, Aloe Vera, Vitamin B5, and Rooibos Tea Leaf. It will leave your hair and scalp feeling soft and healthy. The conditioner has a rich creamy texture.

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten free
  • GMO free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty free
  • Treated hair safe
  • 8oz BPA Free Recyclable Bottle

How to use

Apply to wet hair, massage in well for at least a minute, then rinse out with warm water. Repeat if required. 

Ingredients

Water (aqua), decyl glucoside, cocamidopropyl betaine (derived from coconut oil), sodium c14-16 olefin sulfonate, panthenol (vitamin b5), glycerin (vegetable), salicylic acid, aspalathus linearis (african rooibos) leaf extract*, butyrospermum parkii (african shea butter) fruit nut extract*, pygeum (prunus africanum) bark extract*, capsicum frutescens (african cayenne) fruit extract*, quillaja (african saponaria soap) bark extract*, salix alba (willow) bark extract*, camellia oleifera (green tea) leaf extract*, ginkgo biloba (ginkgo) leaf extract*, rosemarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, equisetum hiremale (horsetail) plant extract*, urtica dioca (nettle) root extract, salvia officinalis (sage) leaf extract*, symphytum officinalis (comfrey) root extract*, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf extract, trigonella foenum graecum (fenugreek) seed extract*, citrus grandis (grapefruit seed) extract*, glucose & glucose

entry.title: Thin & Fine Weak Hair Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Shampoo
Price: 15.00

Thin Fine Hair Shampoo is enriched with Panthenol and Biotin to thicken each strand of hair, making your hair fuller and healthier looking.  Wheat protein restores moisture balance, elasticity & shine. Your hair will have more body and strength instantly.

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten free
  • GMO free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty free
  • Treated hair safe

How to use

Apply shampoo to wet hair, massage in well for at least a minute, then rinse out with warm water. Repeat if required. Apply conditioner and leave that on for a couple of minutes. Then rinse off and finish with COOL water.

Water (aqua), decyl glucoside, cocamidopropyl betaine (derived from coconut oil), sodium c14-16 olefin sulfonate, panthenol (vitamin b5), glycerin (vegetable), polysorbate 80, parfum (herbal), aspalathus linearis (african rooibos) leaf extract*, butyrospermum parkll (african shea butter) fruit nut extract*, pygeum (prunus africanum) bark extract*, capsicum frutescens (african cayenne) fruit extract*, quillaja (african saponaria soap) bark extract*, salix alba (willow) bark extract*, ginkgo biloba (ginkgo) leaf extract*, equisetum hiremale (horsetail) plant extract*, urtica dioca (nettle) root extract, salvia officinalis (sage) leaf extract*, symphytum officinalis (comfrey) root extract*, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf extract, trigonella foenum graecum (fenugreek) seed extract*, citrus grandis (grapefruit seed) extract*, glucose & glucose oxidase & lactoperoxidase (natural preservative), potassium sorbate (food preservative), *certified organic

entry.title: Orange Conditioner Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sōmi Hand-Crafted Body Care
Type: Conditioner Bar
Price: 17.00

Description

Our conditioners are 100% natural and sustainable! To promote strong and healthy hair, we use cocoa butter and castor oil as they are deeply moisturizing and help to repair dry/ damaged hair.

  • All of our Conditioner Bars are handmade. Colour and shape may vary.
  • One conditioner bar can last for up to 2+ months.
  • They are perfect for camping and traveling!
  • Bars are free from sulfates, parabens, synthetic chemicals, fragrance oils, phthalate, silicone, and preservatives.
  • They are vegan and never tested on animals.

     

    How to use

    Wet your hair with water and begin to massage the bar on your scalp and the ends of your hair in a circular motion for good conditioning and then rinse thoroughly. Let the bar dry out after being used.

    Ingredients

    BTMS-50, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Citrus Peel Powder, Orange Essential Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E)

entry.title: Hibiscus Rose Shampoo Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sōmi Hand-Crafted Body Care
Type: Shampoo Bar
Price: 15.99

Description

Our hibiscus rose shampoo bars help nourish your hair and help strengthen your roots! Hibiscus is great for reducing hair loss and thickening your hair. It can be used to help with itchiness of the scalp and dandruff.

  • Recommended for normal hair.
  • All of our Shampoo Bars are handmade. Colour and shape may vary.
  • These are perfect to take when camping and travelling!
  • This is a vegan product and never tested on animals.
  • Shampoo Bars have an average size of 100 grams/ 3.5 oz. One shampoo bar lasts for 2-3 months.
  • Bars are free from sulfates, parabens, synthetic chemicals, fragrance oils, phthalate, silicone, and preservatives.

 

How to use


Wet your hair with water and begin to massage the bar on your scalp in a circular motion for a nice lather and then rinse thoroughly. Let the bar dry out after being used.

Ingredients

SCI, Distilled Water (Hibiscus Tea), Bentonite Clay Powder, Hibiscus and Rose Powder, Castor Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E)

  • These are perfect for camping and traveling!
  • Shampoo Bars have an average size of 100 grams/ 3.5 oz. One shampoo bar lasts for 2-3 months.
  • Free from sulfates, parabens, synthetic chemicals, fragrance oils, phthalate, silicone, and preservatives.

  • This is a vegan product and never been tested on animals.

How to use

Wet your hair with water and begin to massage the bar on your scalp in a circular motion for a nice lather and then rinse thoroughly. Let the bar dry out after being used and make sure to keep it away from water when not being used.

Ingredients

SCI, Distilled Water (Lavender and Chamomile Infusion), Bentonite Clay Powder, Lavender and Chamomile Powder, Castor Oil, Shea Butter, Lavender Essential Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).

entry.title: Universal Shampoo Bar (Normal Hair)
entry.summary:
Vendor: UpFront Cosmetics
Type: Shampoo Bar
Price: 15.00

The Universal Shampoo Bar is infused with uplifting, fresh, herbal, floral tones by agency of lemon, rosemary, and lavender notes. This sulphate-free shampoo bar creates an abundant lather that is pH-balanced to be gentle, non-irritating and safe for colour-treated hair. Provitamin B5 helps retain moisture and protect your hair from the elements. Hydrolyzed oat protein adds softness, aiding in manageability.

(Previous name: Normal Hair Shampoo Bar) 

Each 65g bar replaces up to 3 bottles of liquid shampoo. 

Recommended for: Normal hair types.

Aroma: Floral tones of lavender with undertones of rosemary and lemon.

Usage

Glide bar over wet hair or lather in hands. Massage and scrub into hair to build up a lather. Rinse well.

Ingredients

Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate *CB ,Cocamidopropyl Betaine *CB, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate*CB , BTMS-50 *RO, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Sodium Lactate, Hydrolyzed Oats, Panthenol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Citrus bergamia (Bergmont) Oil , Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Oil , Cedrus atlantica (Cedarwood) Oil and Geogard.

 *CB = Coconut derived cleansing agent, RO = Rapeseed Oil derived conditioning agent

Net Weight : 65g / 2.2oz

Store bar in a dry location.

Free from

Parabens, sulphates, synthetic fragrance, & animal ingredients.

entry.title: Revitalizing Shampoo Bar (Oily Hair)
entry.summary:
Vendor: UpFront Cosmetics
Type: Shampoo Bar
Price: 15.00

The Revitalizing Shampoo Bar offers the perfect balance of moisture and cleansing for oily hair. Amino acids and rosemary extract gently clarify, leaving hair balanced and refreshed with a bright citrus and woody aroma. This sulphate-free shampoo bar creates an abundant lather that is pH-balanced to be mild, non-irritating and safe for colour-treated hair. ﻿Each 65g bar replaces up to 3 bottles of liquid shampoo.

(Previously Oily Shampoo Bar)

Each 65g Shampoo Bar replaces up to 3 bottles of liquid shampoo.

Recommended for: Oily hair types.

Aroma: ﻿Citrus and woodsy.

Usage

Glide bar over wet hair or lather in hands. Massage well concentrating on mid-shaft to ends. Rinse well.

Ingredients

Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate *CB, Cocamidopropyl Betaine *CB, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate *CB, Behentrimonium Methosulphate *RO, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Hydrolzed Oats, Sodium Lactate, Panthenol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol (and) Caprylyl Glycol (and) Sorbic Acid.

*CB = Coconut derived cleansing agent, RO = Rapeseed Oil derived conditioning agent

Net Weight : 65g / 2.2oz

Store bar in a dry location.

Free from

Parabens, sulphates, synthetic fragrance, & animal ingredients.

entry.title: Nourishing Shampoo Bar (Dry Hair)
entry.summary:
Vendor: UpFront Cosmetics
Type: Shampoo Bar
Price: 15.00

The Nourishing Shampoo Bar intensely moisturizes for perfectly quenched hair. Hydrating mango seed butter and hydrolyzed oat protein combat the impacts of element exposure and distress for ultimate manageability. Featuring floral notes of ylang ylang, lavender, and geranium, this gentle formula is the ultimate in restoration. This sulphate-free shampoo bar creates an abundant lather that is pH-balanced to be mild, non-irritating and safe for colour-treated hair.

(Previous name: Dry Hair Shampoo Bar)

Each 65g bar replaces up to 3 bottles of liquid shampoo. 

Recommended for: Dry hair types.

Aroma: Exotic, floral scent

Usage

Glide bar over wet hair or lather in hands. Massage and scrub into hair to build up a lather. Rinse well. 

Ingredients

Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate *CB ,Cocamidopropyl Betaine *CB, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate *CB, Behentrimonium Methosulfate *RO, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Sodium Lactate, Hydrolyzed Oats, Panthenol, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Yalng III) Oil , Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil and Geogard.

*CB = Coconut derived cleansing agent, RO = Rapeseed Oil derived conditioning agent

Net Weight : 65g / 2.2oz

Store bar in a dry location.

Free from

Parabens, sulphates, synthetic fragrance, & animal ingredients.
